author: ningjiang
msg: [CXF-326] Got cxf-rt-bindings-http, cxf-jca and cxf-systest's test passed with cxf-rt-transports-http2.

TO test the cxf-transports-http2 with the other modules, you need to replaced the ./rt/ws/rm/pom.xml, ./rt/bindings/http/pom.xml, ./systests/pom.xml and ./integration/jca/pom.xml's related modules from "cxf-rt-transports-http" to "cxf-rt-transports-http2" in your working space.
And run mvn clean install from trunk.

author: felicity
msg: bug 3466: do the bayes expiry after results have been passed back to the client from spamd, helps avoid client timeouts, etc.
